entry.title: ₿uilder 6
entry.content:
Intro

  • Chatham housde rules. No photos/videos.
  • 10 second intros
    • Name, what you do, what you want to get out of ₿uilder

Presentations and Q&A

  • Human Bitcoin Addresses with BIP 353 (Mat)
  • The Bitcoin Merchant Community (Haley)
  • Square Bitcoin UX (Angela)

Startup Demo

  • Impressionista.fun (Mat)
  • Hivemind (Bitkarrot)

News

  • CFTC allows bitcoin, stablecoins as margin collateral in derivatives trading
  • Sports apparel giant Fanatics launches prediction market with Crypto.com
  • UK passes law officially recognizing crypto as third kind of property
  • Kraken acquires Backed Finance in tokenization push
  • Atkins confirms January launch for SEC's crypto 'innovation exemption'
  • Vanguard to allow clients to access cryptocurrency ETFs
  • Sony Bank to launch US stablecoin for games and anime
  • Tether becomes the largest independent holder of gold in the world, with only central banks owning more
  • Texas reportedly kicks off state Bitcoin reserve with $5 million IBIT purchase
  • South Korea's largest exchange Upbit to pursue Nasdaq IPO after merger
  • Kalshi secures $1 billion in latest funding at $11 billion valuation
  • Bitcoin Core's first public third-party audit finds no major vulnerabilities
  • Samourai wallet co-founder Bill Hill sentenced to 4 years in prison for unlicensed money transmitting

Other

  • @PresidioBitcoin on YouTube
  • @PresidioPod and @PresidioBitcoin on X
  • Email hello@presidiobitcoin.org with inquiries

entry.title: ₿uilder 5
entry.content:
Intro

  • Chatham housde rules. No photos/videos.
  • Welcome, Vancouver ₿uilder!
  • 10 second intros
    • Name, what you do, what you want to get out of ₿uilder

Presentations and Q&A

  • Jackson Cook on Square launch
  • Joe Carlo from Pink Owl Coffee
  • Josh Philippe on Fold’s upcoming new app

Startup Demo

  • Andrés Maceira on Guarana Bank

Discussions Topics

  • What does a world with sustainable censorship-resistant transactions look like?
  • What does bitcoin scaling look like long-term? (see thread)

News

  • Bitcoin for Signal
  • Square bitcoin stickers

entry.title: ₿uilder 4
entry.content:
Vote on Topics

Intro (15 min)

  • Chatham house rules. No photos/videos.
  • Welcome, Austin ₿uilder! Great to see more of these pop up around the world!
  • Presidio Bitcoin Design Week recap, Pitch Day teaser, and Type 1 Summit
  • 10 second intros
    • Name, what you do, what you want to get out of ₿uilder

Kody Low on Vibecoding with Bitcoin (30 min)

  • Demo on how to make a bitcoin app using Replit
  • Opportunities Replit's looked at with Bitcoin

Phoenix Demo + UX Critique (25 min)

  • Damian will lead a demo, everyone download the app, and we'll discuss our experiences so we can provide feedback to Phoenix

News / Discussions (40 min)

  • Credit cards ramping up: Fold<>Visa, Coinbase
  • EASYGROUP launches retails bitcoin app link
  • PayPal ushers in a new era of peer-to-peer payments link
  • OpenSats grant fuels bitcoin-safe’s secure multisig link
  • ZBD’s SDK powers bitcoin earnings in mobile games, driving 124% revenue growth link
  • Vibe coding searches WAY down. Bubble? Search obsolete? Link
  • Figma made its design tools more accessible to AI agents link
  • Save Our Wallets poster and flyers

Show and Tell (10 min)

  • Have a cool app or project that you've created? We'd love to see it!

entry.title: ₿uilder 3
entry.content:
Vote on Topics

Intro (5 min)

  • Chatham house rules. No photos/videos.
  • Presidio Bitcoin design week in September
  • 10 second intros
    • Name, what you do, what you want to get out of ₿uilder

Live Vibe Coding Request (20 min)

  • Damian vibe-code based on audience suggestions

Vibe Coded App Showcase (3 min)

  • BLOCKADORO: A Pomodoro timer using blocks as the unit of time

Startup Showcase (20 min)

  • Agicash demo and alpha announcement

Discussions (60 min)

  • What is "Hyperbitcoinization"? Audience is encouraged to provide their own definitions!
  • Marketing to Normies
  • KPI's for a startup building on top of Bitcoin?
  • Bitchat. How does it work? How will it evolve?
  • Bitcoin Treasury Companies. What are they? How do they work? Will they blow up?
  • How to build a network of off-grid solar compute
  • Discuss all the ways you can send bitcoin!
  • Jack Dorsey's Vibe Coding Tips

News (10 min)

  • Block Unveils Proto Rig and Proto Fleet, Marking a New Era in Bitcoin Mining
  • CorpChains announced
    • Google unveils L1 GCUL
    • Stripe unveils L1 Tempo
    • Circle unveils L1 Arc

entry.title: ₿uilder 2
entry.content:
Vote on Topics

Intro (5 min)

  • Chatham house rules. No photos/videos.
  • Our 2nd event…review what we learned last time and applying to this one
  • Presidio Bitcoin design week in September https://event.bitcoin.design
  • Miami ₿uilder, and hoping to see more of these pop up around the world!
  • 10 second intros
    • Name, what you do, what you want to get out of ₿uilder

Vibe-Coded App Showcase (30 min)

  • Mat Balez Zero to Bitcoin App in under 15 minutes
  • Damian demo'ing Sando

Startup Showcase (10 min)

  • David Bryson checkout.tech demo

Discussions (60 min)

  • “maybe human money and machine money will be totally different things” https://x.com/sama/status/1945541270438646270
  • Why build with bitcoin vs. stablecoins?
  • Future of bitcoin payment protocols, tech platforms
  • How to untangle payment protocol mess
  • Pick a big tech company/product…brainstorm how bitcoin could be added to it and add value
  • Mixing digital and physical world: Integrating vibe-coded apps with billboards

News (15 min)

  • Simple Proof. How does it compare to OpenTimestamps? Why hasn’t a product like this found product-market fit yet? https://stacker.news/items/1041737/r/dk
  • Coinbase integrates farcaster … can an everything-app like Base catalyze payments? https://x.com/base/status/1945624674656030985
  • Nevada the new Delaware? https://x.com/a16z/status/1942974830774829428
  • Big beautiful bill impact on bitcoin mining and taxes https://x.com/WilsonMining/status/1945179417279652036

entry.title: ₿uilder 1
entry.content:
Vote on Topics

Intro (10 min)

  • Chatham House Rules — No photos/videos
  • This is our first ₿uilder! We’re very open to feedback and ideas on how to make these events great. Feel free to suggest ideas during the meetup or afterwards
  • Define ₿uilder and purpose for starting this event series
  • Anyone can be a ₿uilder! Vibe coding makes building apps approachable and intuitive
  • Quick Show of Hands
    • Who works for big tech? PM? Designer? Other?
    • Who has vibe coded before? Integrated bitcoin?
  • 10 Second Intros
    • Name
    • What you do
    • What you want to get out of ₿uilder

Vibe-Coded App Showcase

  • Anyone?

Startup Showcase

  • Agicash

Bitcoin Products (20 min)

  • Block rolls out Bitcoin payments on Square at the Bitcoin 2025 Conference in Las Vegas
    • Steak N Shake reports 50% savings on processing fees when using BTC
  • Square is earning 9.7% returns on its C= Lighting Service Provider
    • Bitrefill reports 3.5% returns
    • Amboss launches Rails, a self-custody Bitcoin yield service
  • Coinbase Credit Card preannouncement. 2%–4% back in BTC depending on assets held
  • Start9 moves Knots to the Main Registry Previously in the Community Registry
    • Knots at 13% market share
  • Home equity → bitcoin: Horizon and Sovana
  • Lightning Wallet Market in Japan 64%: Wallet of Satoshi
  • Foundation will release Passport Prime in Q3
  • COLDCARD Co-Sign (CCC)
  • Bitkey introduces Security Hub
  • Ledger sunsets Nano S
  • Xverse integrates Lightning via Sati
  • Wallet of Satoshi non-custodial wallet available again in the US
  • Blitz: first Spark mobile wallet
  • Magic Eden partners with Spark for faster and cheaper BTC settlements
  • Cake wallet adds Payjoin v2

Regulatory (4 min)

  • Federal Housing Director orders Fannie Mae to consider Crypto as an asset for obtaining mortgages
  • Clarity Act heads to House floor for Vote
    • BRCA included in market structure bill, the Clarity Act
    • Save our Wallets

Bitcoin Design (30 min)

  • ₿-only convention for displaying bitcoin quantities
    • BIP-177 describes a new approach to bitcoin units that deprecates both the use of decimals and the usage of “sats/satoshis”
    • New page added to Design guide with proposed best practices
    • Boardwalk Cash is an example of a product leading and embracing the change
  • Seedless is safer debate

Discussions (40 min)

  • The emergence of vibecoding
  • TradFi payments vs. stablecoins vs. bitcoin: Where does bitcoin separate itself?
  • Mixing digital and physical: Integrating vibe-coded apps with billboards

Miscellaneous (1 min)

  • Presidio Bitcoin Quantum Summit: Applications Open
  • Presidio Bitcoin Design Week in September (more info coming soon)
  • Miami ₿uilder — and hopes for more around the world!

Wrapping Up (5 min)

  • What went well?
  • Areas of improvement for future meetups
